name: Integral'sQuickComputerandTechTips
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily tech updates from the tech support experts at Integral. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. 

Integral has 25+ years of experience providing support to home and business computer users. If you are looking for assistance with a new computer, installing hardware or software, scanning for and removing a virus, or looking for advice on new technology, we’re there for you. We take the stress out of technology by providing one-on-one, easy to understand (non-geek speak) support, training and solutions.We provide on-site and online tech support for homes and offices. We fix Macintosh, Windows, Apple, Android, printers, routers, smarthome, and everything else that connects to the Internet. Most tech support companies focus on fixing computers and technology, we focus on support the people who use them.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
